title: Enslave: Beauty Tames the Beast
description: “Cathy Yardley gives bedtime stories a new twist….Fairy tales were never like this!” -- New York Times bestselling author Susan Squires   Some fairy tales are definitely not for children! With Enslave, author Cathy Yardley updates the famous “Beauty and the Beast” story, giving it a distinctly adult, deliciously erotic treatment. Having previously reimagined “Sleeping Beauty” ( Ravish ) and “Snow White” ( Crave ), Yardley now completes the trilogy, cementing her reputation as one of the hottest stars of literary erotica with a steamy and sensation bedtime tale that would make the Brothers Grimm blush.
author: Cathy Yardley
